name: SARSOrganismOrSubstanceInLabResults
title: SARS (Organism or Substance in Lab Results)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains organisms or substances relevant for reporting SARS coronavirus (SARS CoV).),(Data Element Scope: Organism names or substances reported in laboratory results),(Inclusion Criteria: SNOMED:  Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus organism;  
SARS coronavirus nucleic acid substance;),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
